scenes.description: Shiori prepares to enter the portal from a dark, mysterious world.
Shiori arrives at the bright castle garden and explores her new surroundings, noticing her improved 3D movement.
Shiori performs her original song 'Moth' in the castle garden as it transitions between day and night.

subtitles.original: Sigh.
subtitles.english: Sigh.

subtitles.original: Here goes nothing.
subtitles.english: Here goes nothing.

subtitles.original: Huh?
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: What is this place?
subtitles.english: What is this place?

subtitles.original: Ah? What?
subtitles.english: Ah? What?

subtitles.original: Hey! You! Get back here!
subtitles.english: Hey! You! Get back here!

subtitles.original: It's just gone now, I guess.
subtitles.english: It's just gone now, I guess.

subtitles.original: At least it's a nice place.
subtitles.english: At least it's a nice place.

subtitles.original: I was expecting something scary.
subtitles.english: I was expecting something scary.

subtitles.original: It's not too bad.
subtitles.english: It's not too bad.

subtitles.original: Then again, I hate the sun.
subtitles.english: Then again, I hate the sun.

subtitles.original: Got some pretty flowers over there.
subtitles.english: Got some pretty flowers over there.

subtitles.original: Some pretty butterflies.
subtitles.english: Some pretty butterflies.

subtitles.original: I wonder who takes care of these though.
subtitles.english: I wonder who takes care of these though.

subtitles.original: Someone has to be a gardener here, right?
subtitles.english: Someone has to be a gardener here, right?

subtitles.original: He got a big giant castle. Nice.
subtitles.english: He got a big giant castle. Nice.

subtitles.original: Wow.
subtitles.english: Wow.

subtitles.original: I wonder if that place is inhabited. Hmm.
subtitles.english: I wonder if that place is inhabited. Hmm.

subtitles.original: If not, I'm gonna take that place.
subtitles.english: If not, I'm gonna take that place.

subtitles.original: Oh. I feel a lot more complete too, thinking about it.
subtitles.english: Oh. I feel a lot more complete too, thinking about it.

subtitles.original: A little bit more fluid in my motion.
subtitles.english: A little bit more fluid in my motion.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: Thankfully no one's here to see this.
subtitles.english: Thankfully no one's here to see this.

subtitles.original: Huh.
subtitles.english: Huh.

subtitles.original: For some reason, my heart feels funny.
subtitles.english: For some reason, my heart feels funny.

subtitles.original: It's acting weird.
subtitles.english: It's acting weird.

subtitles.original: Not sure why.
subtitles.english: Not sure why.

subtitles.original: I think... not crap.
subtitles.english: I think... not crap.

subtitles.original: I think... I think I'm breaking down!
subtitles.english: I think... I think I'm breaking down!

subtitles.original:
ガ
Lyrics • Music: 鬱P
subtitles.english:
Moth
Lyrics • Music: Utsu-P

subtitles.original:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you
subtitles.english:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you

subtitles.original: あたし蛾だと知りゃ皆嫌うが あの蝶と何が違う?
subtitles.english:
If you knew I were a moth, you'd all hate me
But how am I different from that butterfly?

subtitles.original: あたし蛾だと知らず皆ガサツに 繭を開く
subtitles.english:
Not knowing I'm a moth, you all crudely
Open up the cocoon

subtitles.original:
頭ちゃらんぽらん 下手具不乱不乱
宵のまにまに 裾絡み合い
subtitles.english:
Empty-headed, staggering about
In the depths of the night, our hems intertwining

subtitles.original:
蝶々の不乱不乱 闇雲喰らう喰らう
飛んで火に入った 数の自慢ばっか
subtitles.english:
A butterfly's wild dance, devouring blindly
Just boasting about how many flew into the fire

subtitles.original: きれいな羽だけを欲しがってる 撒き散らすscaleは見ない
subtitles.english:
You only want the beautiful wings
You don't look at the scales I scatter about

subtitles.original:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you
subtitles.english:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you

subtitles.original: ああどうせ 自分一粉 自分一粉まみれ
subtitles.english:
Ah, anyway, I'm just covered
in my own dust, my own powder

subtitles.original: 昆虫の身分一粉 身分一粉でブラドメ
subtitles.english:
With an insect's status, I'm brand-named
by this powder, this status

subtitles.original: 「あんた蛾なのに頑張っててエライエライ」
subtitles.english: "You're doing so well for a moth, good girl, good girl"

subtitles.original: 「だけど蛾のくせにハッピーそうで不快不快」
subtitles.english: "But you look so happy for a moth, how disgusting"

subtitles.original: 切り抜き動画で孵化を観 感動して動画を消し 颯爽と過ごして
subtitles.english:
Watching the hatching in a clip, being moved,
then closing it and moving on briskly

subtitles.original: 正義の瞬間だけしかいらんらん 感傷の涙に溶かしたバイバイ
subtitles.english:
Only wanting the moments of justice
Good-bye, dissolved in sentimental tears

subtitles.original:
数あるペインペイン 奴らへの隠蔽隠蔽
生々しさは綺麗にさっぱりバーリーナイト
subtitles.english:
Endless pain, concealing it from them
All the rawness wiped clean on this burly night

subtitles.original: きれいなハンディだけを欲しがってる 実際は違っても美談
subtitles.english:
They only want the beautiful handicaps
A moving tale, even if the reality is different

subtitles.original:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you
subtitles.english:
You are blind, have no blood
Just consume soon, soon, soon
You don't know about me, you, you, you

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 所詮 偏見過度の嫌い 過度の美化でパスだね
subtitles.english:
Ah, in the end, it's just hatred from prejudice
And a pass given by excessive glorification

subtitles.original: こちらの身分差分 身分差分でブラドメ
subtitles.english:
With this status difference, I'm brand-named
by this status, this difference

subtitles.original:
Why don't you wanna be a moth?
(ちょうちょよちょうちょ 息の根とまれ)
Don't you wanna be a moth?
subtitles.english:
Why don't you wanna be a moth?
(Little butterfly, little butterfly, stop your breath)
Don't you wanna be a moth?
